sentences.sContent: The EU Council of Finance Ministers failed to reach a consensus on the pace of integration.
sentences.sCn: 欧盟财政部长会议未能就一体化的进度达成共识。

sentences.sContent: The general consensus was that technology was a good thing.
sentences.sCn: 大家都认为科技是好东西。

sentences.sContent: the consensus politics of the fifties

words.tran: 同意；（意见等的）一致；赞成

trans.tranOther: an opinion that everyone in a group agrees with or accepts
